title: Pre Season Toxicity/ Trolls
body:
Past 3-4 days have come across multiple amounts of trolls and afk'ers etc.

And it's quite amazing to see how much it impacts games now...

It's nearly impossible for me to play a game with out having someone troll or afk. in my last 20 games there at least been a troll or afk'er in 15 of those.

And sadly they will never get punished, it kind of makes me not want to play the game any more since it's a complete waste of time. And the trolls essentially control the game.

replies.body: i have not seen a single troll all pre season

I've come across some toxic players, only one troll though. What gamemodes are you playing? I've mainly just been playing ARAMs, which is a bit more laid back style of gamemode. Would like to know which you have been playing as to where they are more frequent.

Just remember to report anyone who is toxic or trolling :)
Just in ranked in the Platinum area, pretty annoying since I only played ranked ( can't handle normals and ARAM's)
